channel.title: Loading times/menu freeze
channel.description:
Hi, wouldn't it be possible to somehow reduce the time it takes to load a new map? I know that it's an engine limitation, but still... My brother has a high-end PC and still it's like this. Why can't I and others choose multi-core rendering option?
Also sometimes when I press escape and want to save/load, it "freezes" and takes 10-15 seconds for the window to show up.
It kinda breaks the immersion.
